data.title: heise online – IT news, guides and background information
data.meta_description: News and forums on computers, IT, science, media and politics. Price comparison of hardware and software as well as downloads at Heise Medien.
data.text:
For advertising: Firefox now collects user data by default

Firefox presents itself as the first choice for data protection. But the new version collects data for advertisers by default. Normal or a breach of trust?

iX Magazin

Fatal crowdstrike update: we need more producer liability

A broken CrowdStrike update paralyzes large parts of the IT world. Manufacturers must take responsibility for errors, security expert Jürgen Schmidt says.

heise Security

Apple patent: Open WLANs better sorted

At the moment, it is not possible to determine how good or secure free Wi-Fi networks are from the iOS view. In future, a smart ranking should help.

Mac & i

Google shows Pixel 9 Pro and 9 Pro Fold

Photos of the Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro Fold have been leaked online. Google has responded and shows the new smartphones in a video.

Eight years after release: "No Man's Sky" gets huge graphics update

In the years following its release, "No Man's Sky" was gradually upgraded with new content. Now developer Hello Games is significantly upgrading the graphics.

Deutschlandticket: Federal government wants to keep price stable for 2024

A law must be changed to ensure that the Deutschlandticket does not become more expensive this year. The German government has now initiated this.
